authentication-prompt: To finalize this lesson, please login in to your ISLE account. If you have not created one, please sign up and get access to the full functionality of ISLE.
confirmation-email: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
lesson-completed-msg: Dear {{name}}, this is an automatic confirmation email to inform you that you have successfully completed lesson "{{lessonName}}" of course "{{namespaceName}}". {{msg}}
